channel.title: api on Home
channel.description: Recent content in api on Home

item.title: Fortunes on Slack
item.description: view the service homepage Introduction Have always enjoyed the UNIX fortunes program, ever since I was a wee newbie. If you aren’t familiar with it (sad), yes, its like a fortune cookie. It can be more technical in nature but not always.

item.title: OpenAPI Directory & Swagger
item.description: Was browsing github and I came across the OpenAPI Directory. A good directory of API’s will help in thinking of a mobile app idea. Couldn’t help but notice that all the API’s implement something called OpenAPI ("Swagger") 2.0. Ok, great, consistency in API specs, that will help if you had to write one.
